 # 🏦 BankAlpy

 **BankAlpy** is a backend Java project built using the **MVC architecture**.
 It begins as a simple console application using in-memory data structures and evolves toward full persistence with **H2 SQL** and **Spring Boot**.

 ## 🎯 Goals
 - Understand backend design in Java.
 - Apply the MVC architecture pattern.
 - Learn persistence with H2 and SQL.
 - Generate documentation with **Quarto** and publish it on GitHub Pages.
